mods.abstract: Ran Away. FROM the undersigned at Opleousas, about a week ago, a mulatto boy named GUSTIN, alias William, aged about 22 years, about 5 feet 10 inches high, tolerably strong built, speaks French and English fluently. He may have gone to his wife, at Baton Rouge. A liberal reward will be given for his apprehension and delivery to the undersigned, or for his lodging in one of the Jails of the State, so that he may be recovered. T. LASTRAPES. Opelousas, July 26, 1862.
